title: Bulk invoice upload (CSV/Excel)
answer: Go to Billing â†’ Invoices. Use the Bulk Upload option to upload your CSV/Excel. Make sure columns match the template (Party, Date, Item, Qty, Rate, GST%, Place of Supply).

title: GST mismatch / GST not matching totals
answer: GST mismatches usually happen due to inclusive vs exclusive amounts, wrong rate, CGST/SGST vs IGST, or rounding. Confirm place of supply and whether the amount includes GST.

title: Personal expense vs business expense (Drawings)
answer: If narration indicates personal use, treat it as Drawings: Debit Drawings, Credit Cash/Bank. This avoids impacting Profit & Loss. Always review before posting.
